summary: This bill, the Brian Tally VA Employment Transparency Act of 2025, amends Title 38 of the United States Code to increase accountability and transparency regarding healthcare providers for the Department of Veterans Affairs. It addresses non-Department contractors' liability under Federal tort claims laws, mandating information disclosure to individuals and potentially revoking authorization for providers with multiple malpractice cases. The bill also requires notifications to state licensing entities and the National Practitioner Data Bank following judgments against the U.S. and mandates online explanations of individual rights. Finally, the bill addresses accountability of VA physicians regarding negligence or malpractice.
